text: Lucian Nicolae Ion (born 10 March 1994 in Otopeni) is a Romanian footballer who plays as a midfielder for Concordia Chiajna.Se caută mijlocaşi. Concordia i-a adus pe Lucian Ion şi Bărbulescu. 100sport.ro ==References== ==External links== * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Romanian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Liga I players Category:Liga II players Category:CS Otopeni players Category:CS Balotești players Category:CS Concordia Chiajna players Category:CS Sportul Snagov players
title: Lucian Ion
